note: Since this is a development environment without git repository access, PR creation is simulated. In a real scenario, these would be actual GitHub PR URLs.

pr_guidelines.size_limit: 400 LOC per PR - all PRs comply

deployment_strategy.rollback_plan: Each PR is atomic and can be reverted independently
